February 21, 2026

A Big Weekend for Brooks County Cats: 19 Spayed and Neutered

It was a big weekend for the cats of Brooks County. Five stray cats from a single Quitman homeowner were spayed or neutered this weekend, bringing the total at that location to 15 cats over the past few months — with another 14 cats from surrounding areas also receiving surgery.

November 14, 2024

What is TNR and Why It Works: A Complete Guide for Community Members

If you've noticed cats roaming your neighborhood in Barney or northern Brooks County, you're not alone. Discover how TNR (Trap-Neuter-Return) provides the most humane and effective solution for managing community cat populations.

October 27, 2024

The Truth About Community Cats: Separating Fact from Fiction

Community cats face many misconceptions that can lead to ineffective or harmful approaches. Let's examine the facts about community cats in Brooks County and debunk common myths with evidence-based information.

How You Can Help Community Cats in Brooks County: Your Guide to Making a Real Difference

Every day, community cats in Barney and northern Brooks County need our help. Whether you're a long-time animal lover or someone who's just noticed cats in your neighborhood, there are meaningful ways you can contribute to improving their lives.
